channel.description: Inline and Event Hooks Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: New IAM Developers,Developers new to Okta Description: An overview of event and inline hooks, what they are, and some basic use cases. Establisht eh difference between hooks and the Workflows platform, and then provide link to the more detailed “How to Implement a hook section” (ID: 660) Links to original docs: - Event hooks: https://developer.
